Artifact.name: Win 10 YourPhone app (Settings)
Artifact.Query: SELECT phone_apps.app_name as 'Application Name', phone_apps.package_name as 'Package_Name', phone_apps.version as 'Version', settings.setting_group_id as 'groupid', settings.setting_type as 'settingstype', case settings.setting_value when 0 then 'off' else settings.setting_value end as 'settingsvalue', phone_apps.blob as 'Icon', phone_apps.etag as 'etag' from phone_apps left join settings on settings.setting_key = phone_apps.package_name order by app_name asc
